title: Hong Kong ‘Value’ Billionaire Puts Quarter of His Wealth in Gold
description: For three decades, Cheah Cheng Hye was a face of value investing in Asia, building Value Partners Group Ltd. into a multi-billion dollar stock-picking powerhouse.
